title: Barclays mobile app makes me log in every 2 mins to allow the contactless pay to work. Any ideas?
content:
Each time I log into the Barclays app the notification for 'contactless mobile payments active' will only appear for a minute or so before it requires me to log into the app again to reactivate. I've tried changing the privacy setting on the phone but this doesn't seem to work.
Any ideas on how to extend the availability time?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
